import React from "react"; const ContactPage = () => { return (
Want to get in contact with me?
This is a greate way for you to reach out to me if you like my website or have qustions.

It may take some time until you receive a response.

I will be in touch as soon as possible and appreciate your patience.

I'll never share your email with anyone else.
); }; export default ContactPage;
